name: ormEvictQueries
description: This will remove all the queries from the named query cache. If name is not specified, all queries from default cache will be removed.

params.name: cacheName
params.description: Name of the cache region that you want to evict. If you do not specify the cache, the default query cache is evicted.

params.name: datasource
params.description: Name of the data source whose cache you want to evict.

examples.title: Evicts all the Hibernate cached queries for the default cache.
examples.description: This will remove any cached queries from the default cache and cause the query to run again
